<title level="1" pfs="">[Flea Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=502)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Flea swarms roil across city streets and rural hinterlands in a hissing, scraping scrabble, draining blood from any creatures unfortunate enough to cross their path.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Flea Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=502)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 83</row>

**Perception** +13; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 55

**Immunities**
disease, precision, swarm mind

**Resistances**
physical 8 (except bludgeoning)

**Weaknesses**
area damage 4, splash damage 4

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Flea Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) Drain from flea fever can’t be reduced or recovered from naturally until the disease is cured. **Saving Throw** DC 19 Fortitude; **Stage 1** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1d4 hours), **Stage 2** drained 1 and [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (1 day), **Stage 3** drained 2 and sickened 1 (1 day), **Stage 4** drained 3 and sickened 1 (1 day), **Stage 5** dead

**Suck Blood** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The flea swarm’s last action was Swarming Bites, and it dealt damage to at least one enemy; **Effect** The flea swarm drinks the creatures’ blood. Each victim becomes drained 1 and the swarm regains 3 HP for each victim drained.

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm’s space takes 2d4+7 piercing damage and must attempt a DC 22 basic Reflex save. A creature that fails its save is exposed to flea fever.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-117" />
name: Flea Swarm
